List all stops served by KMB route 11.

Gemini:

KMB Route 11 Stops:

Northbound:

  • Causeway Bay (Cantonese: 銅鑼灣)
  • Canal Road Flyover (Cantonese: 運河道天橋)
  • Canal Road West (Cantonese: 運河西街)
